Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 5-7 Solution
Chapter.Data:
from ScienceFacts import ScienceFacts
# create an object of class ScienceFacts called science science = ScienceFacts()
# use the get_telescope_name() method to get the name of a telescope and store in variable scope_name scope_name = science.get_telescope_name()
# use the method display_telescope_name with the argument scope_name to get information about a telescope science.display_telescope_facts(scope_name)
